ItemType.name: defective weapon enhancement ROM
ItemType.description: Because of a manufacturing defect, this ROM damages the ship's primary weapon when installed.
ItemType.Invoke:
(block ( (theWeapon (objGetProperty gSource 'selectedWeapon)) (data { weapon:(itmGetName theWeapon 'noModifiers) } ) ) (if theWeapon (block Nil (switch (itmGetProperty theWeapon 'damaged) (objSendMessage gSource Nil (typTranslate gType 'msgAlreadyDamaged data))
(itmIsEnhanced theWeapon) (objSendMessage gSource Nil (typTranslate gType 'msgEnhancementLost data))
(objSendMessage gSource Nil (typTranslate gType 'msgWeaponDamaged data)) )
(shpDamageItem gSource theWeapon)
; Identify the item (itmSetKnown gItem)

(objSendMessage gSource Nil (typTranslate gType 'msgNoPrimary)) ) )
